item.description:
We all have our favorite games, some of which we play often at our events and some of which remain in the back of our closets - guilty pleasures that rarely see the light of day but call out "play me, PLAY ME!".  This event will focus on the latter, uncommon games that haven't been played much by our group.  So dust off those hidden jewels and underrated treasures and bring them along to teach something new to some eager gamers.  All kinds of new games are welcome, including word games, card games, and strategy games.

Some examples of known games that don't get played enough are:

  • Blockers
  • Mystery Rummy
  • Star Trek
  • K2
  • Merchants and Marauders
  • Hive
  • Saboteur
  • Kill Doctor Lucky

but feel free to expose us to something completely new!

We will leave it up to group choice on what we play that night. If necessary, we divide into smaller groups depending on group size and game preferences.

---

Food:

Light refreshments will be served, however you are encourage to bring additional food or drink to share with the group.

---

About the Location:

This event is hosted at a private residence in a condo complex.  You will need to call to be let in.  The phone number to call will be sent out to attendees the day before the event.

There is a wonderful but shy cat on the premises.  If you have allergies, but would still like to attend, please message the event host.

There is extremely limited guest parking in the complex (which is an old brick schoolhouse).  You are best suited to find parking on Rantoul Street, School Street or Edwards Street.
